column1: Describe the electric field model as an alteration of space due to the presence of a charged particle.
Describe the direction of electric field lines near a point charge.
Infer from a figure illustrating electric field lines the relative strength of the electric field at points in the figure.
Describe the strength of the electric field inside of a conductor.
Calculate the strength and direction of the electric field any distance away from a point charge.
Calculate the charge of a particle that produces an electric field at a given distance from the particle.
Determine the directions of the individual fields that several point charges produce at a given point in space.
Determine at a given point in space the magnitude and direction of the net electric field produced by one or more point charges.
